translations: 使精力充沛的，使生机勃勃的
使生气勃勃；使兴旺发达；激励，鼓舞（invigorate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: They are looking into ways of invigorating the department.
sentences.translation: 他们正在寻找激发这个部门活力的方法。

sentences.sentence: I hope you enjoy this invigorating morning ritual!
sentences.translation: 我希望你会喜欢这种使人精力充沛的早间习惯！

sentences.sentence: Sleeping in the elm may be invigorating, but it is also illegal.
sentences.translation: 睡在榆树上可能很爽，却是违法的。
